orders_psp_fields_null_when_none.name: orders_psp_fields_null_when_none
orders_psp_fields_null_when_none.value:
"orders"."payment_provider" <> 'none' OR (
        "orders"."psp_charge_id" IS NULL AND
        "orders"."psp_payment_method" IS NULL AND
        "orders"."psp_status_reason" IS NULL
      )
